Articles.Content: Hi I have a weird issue where after I landed a craft on the Mun it tipped over, to fix this I used an engineer to move some landing gear to the front of the craft to tip it back over. However by doing this after leaving the Mun the craft is constantly shaking and cannot be time warped. When checking the map it says that the craft is landed on the Mun which is clearly not true. Below is the only noticeable error in the log which is even weirder since I don't have any cubestrut part on my craft so I'm not sure why it's spamming this.

This “landed while flying” thing is common when you break solar panels on the surface- the broken panel pieces are on the ground, so the game incorrectly thinks the whole craft is still landed when it isn’t. You can fix this by editing the save file, but if you’re not sure how to do that don’t even try- you could end up corrupting the file and lose your save. Try freeloading a save when the lander is still landed, then using EVA construction remove any broken solar panels (or radiators) from the craft, save, then reload the new save- it might help.
